author: Julian Chokkattu
title: Nothing Chats First Look: iMessage on Android
description: The app makes your texts appear in blue chat bubbles on your iOS friends’ phones. But there’s a cost.
content: Having predominantly usedAndroid phones, I am far too familiar with the stigma of being a green bubble. Whenever I message someone with an iPhone, my texts show up in iMessage, the default messaging … [+3169 chars]
